tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Actually I had been getting treatment of all  dental issues of mine as well as my children from Dr . Uma, for nearly 6 to 7 years. Whenever there is any dental issue, like filling or clipping for my children, we only think of her as you can forget about the issue once you go to her clinic. Thanks a lot Madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First and foremost her friendly nature made me fearless, which  is the most prominent cooperation for a doctor.
No much pain  n her prescription helped me a lot to recover very fast.
Her team was good and cooperative.
